Text:
If you want to download the GAME or the Draft Lottery on only:

1. In your utorrent/bittorent client, click this particular NBA torrent.
2. Then go to "Files" tab and wait until 2 files comes up (if you downloaded this torrent via magnet)
3. If you want to download Draft Lottery only, right click on the game file (HeatVsCeltics)and select "Don't download" (then vice versa if you want to download the Game (HeatVsCeltics) file only).
4. Voila!!! Done

Cheerss....
